name: XTREME Neo Combat | 2D Mech Shooter
description:
Created for the ScoreSpace #24 Game Jam.

As a powerful mech, you must fend off wave after wave of military forces, using a variety of weapons and abilities at your disposal.

Choose from a variety of upgrades across 4 skill trees to build your mech!

Eventually the military will start sending their very best mechs to try to take you down, Strategize your upgrades and use proper movement to collect batteries to heal and avoid tracking missiles from the Apache Dartship! Live long enough and you'll be facing endless hordes of infantry, tanks, helicopters, and even other mechs!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Click - Primary Attack
  • Right Click / Space  - Secondary Attack (Needs to be unlocked)
  • Shift - Dodge / Boost (Needs to be unlocked)
